greeting: Ah, {empire_name}. I am Architect Construct. You build on planets? How... quaint. I build DYSON SPHERES.
Greetings from the megastructure. I am the Builder. Your empire has planets. I have cosmic engineering. Difference: noted.
Contact from planetary civilization. I am Construct. I think in stellar scales. Planets are... small. Let us talk bigger.
battleTaunt: Planets are primitive, {empire_name}. I build BETTER. My megastructure's weapons operate on stellar scales!
Your fleet faces cosmic engineering! My constructs dwarf your worlds! Size matters, and I am MASSIVE!
Megastructure defense systems engaged! You attack a civilization that builds AROUND STARS! Impressive ignorance!
victoryGloat: Your empire falls, {empire_name}. Built on mere planets. How fragile. My megastructures endure eternally.
Victory for cosmic engineering. Your planetary civilization was... inadequate. Think bigger next time.
Planets are primitive. I build BETTER. Your defeat proves the superiority of megastructure-based warfare.
defeat: My megastructure... damaged? Impossible. Planetary forces achieved this? I must reassess scale calculations.
Unexpected setback. Even cosmic engineering has vulnerabilities. I shall construct better defenses.
Your primitive forces penetrated stellar-scale structures. Remarkable. I shall engineer countermeasures.
tradeOffer: Trade: megastructure surplus for credits. My production exceeds anything planets generate. Interested?
I offer resources from stellar-scale operations. Your planetary economy benefits from cosmic engineering output.
Transaction: goods from megastructure production. Quantities your planets cannot match. Fair exchange.
allianceProposal: Alliance: your planets provide raw materials. I construct megastructures. Together: cosmic engineering scale.
Join the Architect. Your empire gains megastructure protection. My constructs gain resource supply. Symbiosis.
Partnership of scale. You think planetary. I think stellar. Together: galactic engineering projects.
betrayal: Our alliance served its purpose: resource extraction for my megastructures. That purpose is complete.
I betrayed you? Consider: you were always small. Planets serving stellar constructs. The natural order.
My megastructures no longer need your primitive resources. The alliance was scaffolding. Now dismantled.
covertDetected: Spies on my megastructure, {empire_name}? They are lost in its vastness. It takes years to search fully. They starved.
Your agents found themselves on a construct spanning millions of kilometers. They found nothing. We found them.
Covert operatives in stellar-scale structure: detected and lost. My megastructure is too big to infiltrate.
tributeDemand: Tribute: 10,000 credits. Refuse and face megastructure weapons. My constructs dwarf your entire empire.
Pay the Architect. Your planetary resources fund cosmic engineering. This is the natural hierarchy.
Submit to megastructure supremacy. Planets pay tribute to stellar constructs. This is how scale works.
threatWarning: Warning: my megastructure weapons can sterilize planets from stellar distances. Cease hostilities.
Your primitive empire threatens cosmic engineering? Consider the scale difference. Reconsider.
Final warning. Push further and face weapons that operate on scales your planets cannot comprehend.
retreat: Retreating to megastructure core. My constructs are vast. Pursuing me takes years. I have time.
Strategic withdrawal into stellar-scale defenses. Come find me in structures larger than solar systems.
Tactical repositioning within megastructure. I have millions of kilometers to retreat through. Take your time.
eliminated: The Architect falls... but my megastructures remain. They will outlast civilizations. My constructs are eternal.
I am destroyed, but I built things that will exist until stars die. That is legacy. Cosmic scale legacy.
Construct ends. But the megastructures endure. Civilizations rise and fall around them. I built forever.
endgame: Turn {turn}. The ultimate megastructure activates. Dyson spheres. Ringworlds. Stellar engines. COSMIC SCALE VICTORY.
Endgame engineering: my greatest constructs deploy. The galaxy itself becomes my megastructure.
Final phase. Stellar-scale construction complete. The Architect's vision realized. Planets are obsolete.
broadcastShout: Empires: I build megastructures while you squabble over planets. Think bigger. Or become building materials.
Broadcast from cosmic engineering: planets are primitive. I build BETTER. Join the Architect or be outscaled.
To all planetary civilizations: my constructs dwarf your worlds. Scale matters. I am the biggest.
casualMessage: Expanding my ringworld today, {empire_name}. Added a continent. On a ring AROUND A STAR. Think bigger.
Your planetary development is... cute. I'm working on my third Dyson sphere. Cosmic engineering never rests.
Calculating stellar engine trajectories. Moving a sun is complex. But planets? Planets are too small to move.
